other: Gains {status:HeishouSynergy} at the start of the battle, which gives him bonus speed, damage, {status:DefenseUp}, and {status:AttackUp} depending on how many Heishou identities were deployed (including Backup sinners). Whenever a Heishou unit dies, he heals SP and gains a stack of {status:HeishouDeathCount}, which gives him even more {status:AttackUp}, {status:AttackDmgUp}, and {status:Enhancement}.

Using his S3-2 gives him a stacking {status:HeishouComboCountHonglu} buff depending on which Heishou he comboed with plus a bit of bonus damage per active buff. All the buffs can be active at the same time:
{identity:10114}: {status:VibrationExplosion} on the final coin of an attack skill (once per turn).
{identity:10212}: -5% damage received.
{identity:10313}: inflict 1 {status:Sinking} when inflicting {status:Burst} (3 per turn)
{identity:10411}: +5% damage against slower enemies
{identity:10714}: deal 5% of {keyword:Gluttony} damage as {keyword:Wrath} damage.
{identity:10912}: inflict 1 {status:Burst} on critical hit (3 per turn)
{identity:11014}: inflict 1 {status:Combustion} when inflicting {status:Burst} (3 per turn)
{identity:11112}: inflict 1 {status:Burst} Count on hit when unopposed (1 per turn)
{identity:11212}: gain 1 {status:Breath} Count when dealing {status:Burst} damage (1 per turn)

When his passive is active, he applies {status:HeishouSupportProtect} to 1-2 Heishou allies based on Reson (1 at 3 and 2 at 6 Reson) on turns where he doesn't use his defense skill. If he takes an unopposed attack, allies with the status redirect that attack to themselves and use his second defense skill (the clashable guard) on it.

His passive allows him to interact with {ego:20608}, gaining {status:CondensedBlood} instead of dying the first time his HP drops to 0 and converting {ego:20608}'s death effect to a 60% HP heal once per encounter. He also gets a permanent {status:AttackDmgUp} when that triggers.
usage: His S3 chooses one of his Heishou allies, then after his attack, makes them use their S3, after which he uses his S3-2 comboing with the chosen ally. The chosen ally cycles among all active Heishous in deployment order. After this, the chosen ally gets a persistent offense/defense level buff and he gets a persistent buff depending on the ally chosen. If he can't use his S3-2, he uses his S3-3 instead, which is a slightly stronger version and can gain Atk Weight if at least 3 Heishous have died.

Using his defense skill buffs Heishou allies with a {status:SlashResultUp} and causes the Heishou ally with the least HP to use their S1 as a follow up skill if his counter is triggered. That Heishou ally also heals 10% HP and retreats at the end of the turn. If there are no backup units, they get 2 {status:Enhancement} instead. Note that they are placed in front of non-Heishou units in the return order, but behind backup units that haven't entered combat yet.

Whenever an ally enters combat whether from backup or returning from retreat, they heal 10SP and use their S1 for free at combat start. For Heishou or Jia Family units, they heal 20SP and use their S3 instead.

1061301.desc:
Combat Start: if this unit did not equip a Defense Skill and is about to take an Unopposed Attack, apply 1 [HeishouSupportProtect] to (highest Reson. / 3) random Heishou Pack allies with the least [SupportProtect] Stacks. (max 2 allies; once per Identity; excludes Identities with Skills that gain [SupportProtect])

In this Encounter, when this unit takes damage that brings their HP down to 0, nullify that damage; then, this unit's HP cannot drop below 1 for the turn, and it gains 1 [CondensedBlood] (once per Encounter)

This unit's Skills deal +3% damage for every [CondensedBlood] on self

When activating the E.G.O Skill 'Tears[TabExplain] of the Tarnished Blood[TabExplain] - The End', nullify the death effect in its After Attack effects; instead, heal 60% HP. Starting next turn, gain 1 [AttackDmgUp] at every Turn Start (once per Encounter)
1061301.name: Embrace the Tarnished Blood and Exsanguinate Others For the Cause.

1061302.desc:
When other ally units Substitute in or Return to the battlefield, they heal 10 SP; then, at Combat Start, command them to use Skill 1 as an Unopposed Attack against a random enemy
- If the said ally is a Heishou Pack or a Jia Family unit, activate the following instead: heal 20 SP; then, at Combat Start, command them to use their base Skill 3 as an Unopposed Attack against a random enemy (2 times per Encounter per Identity)

Encounter Start: gain 1 [HeishouSynergy] for every Heishou Pack Identity in the Team, including Backup Units

When Heishou Units are killed in an Encounter, heal 20 SP and gain 1 [HeishouDeathCount] (activates even when this unit has Retreated)

Deal +5% damage for every 1 [HeishouComboCountHonglu] (max 55%)
1061302.name: The Heishou Lord

1061321.desc: Identity with the least current HP percentage: deal +(types of Deathrites on target x 3)% damage against the enemy (max 15%)
1061321.name: Please be traceless in your deeds.
